ValidationRule.description: A Contractor must be identified when Submitting a Claim that originated from Contractors.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Origin) = 'Contractor', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) = 'Submitted', OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), ISBLANK(Contractor__r.Id) )
